title.rendered: Eldorado Outdoor named one of the “101 Best New Products of 2012”

content.rendered:
Eldorado Outdoor was recently named as one of the “101 Best New Products” of 2012 by Professional Builder and Professional Remodeler magazines. Our product was chosen based on the interest of the readers and the potential benefit to builders, remodelers, and architects.

Keep an eye out for our Eldorado Outdoor product featured in the August 2012 issues of both magazines!
